dialogs.file: The guardians lost their mind when the   wave of magic arrived, it had strongly   impacts on them. I remember when they    fell off screaming out loud things       completely meaningless, and then...then.. changed, they...now...no...they are...   other...thing

Is it true what they say? Have you       finished with that... thing? I cannot    believe it, how did we end up in this    situation? A frog, an enormous frog and  before...before it was the guardian Gustav
Two! You have killed two of them! That   means that Lumine is free again. When the guardian transformed himself into that   sinister tree, he started to repeat 'I am root...I am root...I am root!'

Unbelievable! You escaped without injury and nothing but Etheria in your hands.   After all, we can say that you have 'Good eye and good hands for this situations'  hahahaha, do you get it?                 Because of the guardian...the hands...the ey...it doesn't matter

We arrived at this clearing a few months ago, before the magic disappeared, before the guardians arrived. Daddy was so      afraid and told me to come here, that    essences would protect us, and the       guardians would too
That thick and ugly and unpleasant frog  scared me, and as well she made that     everything was full of  flies  that came to my food
You have ended with that stupid tree, and you took his lantern. From now on I won't be scared of looking for fireflies
The ground doesn't tremble anymore, so... you ended with that nasty monster! His   hands were enormous and they made PLOM    PLOM PLOM how did you do it?
